inclusion.criterion: Indwelling suprapubic Foley urinary catheter for at least 30 days prior to entry
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: anticipation for continued indwelling urinary catheterization for at least 30 days after entry into the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Catheter associated discomfort or difficulty with mucous plugging of the catheter
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No catheter associated discomfort or problems with mucous plugging
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and recurrent UTIs. Urologist not concerned with leaking around cath site.
